changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_guild_infos') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_guild_infos GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.get_guild_infos AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT id, guild_name, guild_mark_code, introduction, notice, free_invencount, cash_invencount, game_money FROM dbo.Guilds
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_guild_infos') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_guild_infos GO
